uuid: Rustam et al. (2023) Am J Respir Crit Care Med
hypothesis: In my research, I focused on understanding the unique cellular organization of human distal airways and how this organization is altered in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). I utilized a novel dissection method to obtain single-cell transcriptomic data from distal airways, allowing me to analyze the cellular composition in detail. The dataset comprised a total of 111,412 single cells isolated from different airway regions of 12 healthy lung donors and pre-terminal bronchioles from 5 patients with COPD. This analysis aimed to identify the biological changes occurring in the distal airways in COPD at single-cell resolution.
result: The dataset information are provided in the hypothesis.
questions: [{'id': 'q1', 'development': '', 'question': 'What unique cell population was characterized as specific to distal airways in the provided data?', 'ideal_answer': 'A) Basal cells', 'distractor_1': 'B) Ciliated cells', 'distractor_2': 'C) Terminal airway-enriched secretory cells (TASCs)', 'distractor_3': 'D) Mucous cells', 'explanation': ''}, {'id': 'q2', 'development': '', 'question': 'In the data, which cell type exhibited a significant increase in frequency in COPD patients compared to healthy subjects?', 'ideal_answer': 'A) Neutrophils', 'distractor_1': 'B) CD81 T cells', 'distractor_2': 'C) Mucous cells', 'distractor_3': 'D) Basal cells', 'explanation': ''}, {'id': 'q3', 'development': '', 'question': 'What was one of the significant findings regarding the expression of genes in COPD distal airways?', 'ideal_answer': 'A) Upregulation of SCGB3A2', 'distractor_1': 'B) Increased SFTPA1 expression', 'distractor_2': 'C) Upregulation of IFN-g response genes', 'distractor_3': 'D) Downregulation of SCGB1A1', 'explanation': ''}, {'id': 'q4', 'development': '', 'question': 'Which type of cells were identified as having reduced differentiative potential in COPD according to the data?', 'ideal_answer': 'A) Terminal cells', 'distractor_1': 'B) Basal cells', 'distractor_2': 'C) Transitional cells', 'distractor_3': 'D) Macrophages', 'explanation': ''}, {'id': 'q5', 'development': '', 'question': 'The data identified TASCs as being lost in which specific regions of the airway in COPD patients?', 'ideal_answer': 'A) Proximal bronchioles', 'distractor_1': 'B) Larger airways', 'distractor_2': 'C) Alveolar ducts', 'distractor_3': 'D) Pre-terminal bronchioles and terminal bronchioles', 'explanation': ''}]
